msIdentifier.repository: Washington State Archives, Eastern Regional Branch
msIdentifier.collection: Spokane County Government; Clerk, Territorial Case Files, 1879-1889

div1.p:
Certificate of Prosecuting Attorney I hereby certify that I have examined the foregoing bill of costs, and that the same amounting to the sum of $1824.70 is just and correct. S.C. Hyde Prosecuting Attorney for Lincoln County
Certificate of Presiding Judge I certify that I have examined the foregoing Bill of Costs, amounting to the sum of $1824.70 and the same appearing to me to be just and correct, is hereby ap- proved and allowed George Turner Associate Justice Supreme Court Washington Territory and Judge Fourth Judicial District
Certificate of Clerk Territory of Washington County of }ss I, ,Clerk of the District Court of the Territory of Washington and for the Fourth Judicial District thereof, do hereby certify that the above and foregoing is a true and correct transcript of the costs in the above entitled cause, as the same now appears on record in my office. IN TESTIMONY WHEREOF I have hereunto set my hand and affixed the seal of said Court this day of 188 Clerk By Deputy
